title: rProject
text:
Initial setup
Publish the project to Quarto Pub interactively by typing
export QUARTO_PUB_AUTH_TOKEN=TOKEN_HERE
quarto publish
Save the generated _publish.yml. Once the _publish.yml is generated, the succeeding builds will be handled by GitHub actions.

title: rProject
text:
Wiki
This website contains resources related to the R (R Core Team, 2023) package rProject outside the pkgdown documentation.




R Core Team. (2023). R: A language and environment for statistical computing. R Foundation for Statistical Computing. https://www.R-project.org/

title: Introduction
text:
Build .Rbuildignore

Description
Build .Rbuildignore


Usage
BuildIgnore(path, project, add = NULL)


Arguments



path
Character string. Project path.


project
Character string. Project name.


add
Character vector. Items to add to .Rbuildignore.






Author(s)

Ivan Jacob Agaloos Pesigan
